body.name: GLAD Mixing Bowls with Pour Spout, Set of 3 | Nesting Design Saves Space | Non-Slip, BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe Plastic | Kitchen Cooking and Baking Supplies, Sage Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 46 mins
features: 3 PIECE MIXING BOWL SET – These nesting mixing bowls include three different sizes for a variety of cooking and baking needs. Small plastic bowl holds 1.2 quarts, medium bowl holds 1.9 quarts, and large bowl holds 3.6 quarts.
FOOD SAFE & NON-TOXIC – These 3 sage green plastic bowls are made of BPA-free, food-safe material. Mixing bowls are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup and safe for use in the freezer.

EMBEDDED POUR SPOUTS – Each bowl is designed with a pour spout on one end and a lip on the other end for easy handling. Perfect for trained chefs, bakers and beginners alike, these bowls make it easy to mix, stir and pour batters or sauces.

NESTED MIXING BOWLS – When not in use, just nest the 3 bowls together for easy storage and organization. The nesting design provides a space-saving convenience to free up extra room in the cupboard for other kitchen tools.

NON-SLIP & NON-STICKY – Base is designed with a silicone bottom to keep each bowl from skidding or slipping during mixing. Ingredients won’t stick to the non-stick plastic surface, making lengthy mixing less tiring.
body.description: Enhance your cooking and baking experience with this Set of Mixing Bowls from Glad!Ask any professional chef, and they will tell you that one factor to making superb meals is having the right tools. Whether you are a trained chef working in a fast-paced kitchen or cooking at home for the entire household, you need a tough arsenal of kitchen gadgets that stay beautifully for a long period of time. Let Glad Mixing Bowls be your partner in providing a smooth and pleasant kitchen experience for you and your family.This set of mixing bowls from Glad includes 3 individual bowls of varying sizes to suit all your cooking and baking needs. The smallest bowl has a 1.2-quart (1.2L) capacity, the medium bowl has a 1.9-quart (1.8L) capacity, and the largest bowl has a 3.6-quart (2.5L) capacity. Each bowl comes with a pour spout to reduce spillage and a lip for easy handling.Product Details:• Bowls are molded from food-safe, BPA-free, non-toxic plastic material• Lightweight but durable and designed for lasting use• Stackable, nesting design maximizes your storage and is great for kitchens with limited space• Easy to clean, dishwasher safe, and freezer safe• Non-slip bottoms prevent sliding and skidding for stable mixing• Non-stick surface lets food come off with ease• Great for mixing, whisking, stirring, and beating• Color: sage green

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3pc Plastic Mixing Bowls Set Nested Mixing Bowls are a Kitchen Must-Have Having the right tools makes everything easier, and this set of big mixing bowls is ready to go to work in your kitchen. The nested design saves space, while offering you 3 convenient sizes. These colorful mixing bowls come in 5 colorways, so you can choose a set that matches your kitchen style. Ideal for Baking and Cooking Built-in pour spouts reduce spillage and make these large mixing bowls easy to use when transferring ingredients. The molded handle makes them easier to maneuver, too. They're ideal for baking, because ingredients won't stick to the smooth plastic surface. Lightweight Yet Durable Mixing Bowls Food safe and BPA-free, this set of molded plastic mixing bowls is lightweight and comfortable to use. Non-slip bottoms help to keep these bowls steady on the countertop while you mix, beat, stir and whisk. Product Highlights Stackable and nestable Food-safe, BPA-free Non-stick interior Non-slip bottoms Molded pour spout Built-in lip handle Freezer safe Dishwasher safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mixing bowls
reviews.reviewText: I love the color of these bowls. The 3 sizes help when baking when you have to separate dry and wet ingredients. Easy to use and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, space saver
reviews.reviewText: Perfect product for my needs. They store together nicely in the cabinet, and because they're a lightweight plastic, it's easy to store in overhead cabinets. The rubber ring on the bottom keeps it secure on the counter during mixing. The largest bowl is the perfect size for a bag of microwave popcorn too. Score!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bowls keep upright
reviews.reviewText: Even when I'm vigorously stirring, these bowls stay upright. Lightweight and well constructed bowls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute color, smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought these bowls for our beach house. They are nice mixing bowls and decent quality for the price. The color is great, but they are a bit smaller than I expected. Probably good for everyday stuff, but not sure if you could easily make a batch of brownies in the largest bowl.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, non-slip
reviews.reviewText: These bowls are in deed non-slip and the spout is very well designed, batter poured well. I also like the form: the straight edges seem to prevent splattering when mixing more liquid batter/fillings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money
reviews.reviewText: Fairly robust plastic. Pouring spout a convenient touch. Should be durable addition to the kitchen armament. Nice bright colors, too!Didn’t even connect the brand name to the plastic bag/wrap/storage company until I saw the logo on the bowls!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work well.
reviews.reviewText: These bowls are very easy to work with. They hold steady to the work surface very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and pretty
reviews.reviewText: They are functional, easy to clean, compact and l love the color!
The bowls were very nice, and great quality. I had to return them, because the colour wasn't right for my kitchen. But otherwise a very nice set of mixing bowls, fast delivery and good quality.
Son cómodos de usar, los diferentes tamaños permiten realizar varias mezclas y con su base hace que no resbalen en la mesa o cocina.
Bonitas, de boa qualidade e muito úteis no dia a dia.
Tienen buen tamaño y muy buena calidad de plástico

reviews.reviewTitle: Pleasantly surprised with the great quality!
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to find nesting bowls with a spout, non-slip and with a handle that weren't the 1/3/5 qt set as I already have lots of them, but I need a set closer in size around the 1 - 3 qt mark. These tick all the boxes and are of really great quality. I am not someone who writes lots of reviews but these are just wonderful for the price. You won't be disappointed.
